meta.title: Free SVG Extractor - Extract & Download SVGs from Any Website
meta.description: Free online tool to extract, preview and download all SVG files (icons, logos, illustrations) from any website. Download each SVG individually or as a ZIP archive. Export individual parts of each SVG.
meta.keywords: svg extractor, download svg, extract svg from website, svg downloader, svg icons, web scraper svg, free svg tool, extract logo svg, download vector images, svg online tool, extract icons from website, svg grabber, bulk svg download

hero.title: Extract SVGs from any website
hero.subtitle: Paste a URL and instantly extract all SVG graphics. Preview them, download individually, or grab them all at once.

results.none: No SVGs found on this page
results.noneSub: Try a different URL or check that the page uses SVG graphics.
